title: To riot games, kled is bugged.  (not op, but bugged)
body:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/Xrqcc0PH-is-kled-dropping-karma-tether-when-hopping-off-his-yoshi-intentional?comment=0007

Just click the link and read.  I have seen kled's get away with tethers and why should they while fizz and vlad do NOT get away with tethers?  Kled should not be breaking tethers when he hops off his Yoshi.  For real 100%.  I know plenty about balance. Been here since season 3 at least.  This may not be a big of a deal with a behind kled, BUT with a fed kled he will hop back on his Yoshi asap through sheer AA damage while sivir shielding a tether.


IT IS BULLSHIT

replies.body: I wanna say Kled, for all intents and purposes, becomes a different champion when he jumps off Skarl. I think he gets rid of pretty much all disables when this happens. The idea, I wager, is that it was Skarl who got tethered, not Kled. Remember, technically, he was announced as "Kled and Skarl". They're both champions, in a way.

He doesn't (at least before a couple weeks ago) get rid of disables (or any debuffs) when dismounting, and the tether isn't a disable anyway.

ok so kled get's a free cleanse while all champions have white privledge.  I get it.  Makes a boatloads of sense.

Hey, don't shoot the messenger, I didn't design Kled nor did I say it was good game design. "Good game design" is a thing that seems to elude Riot far too often in general, so I'm more inclined to say it's not.

As a kled main I say: DONT downvote this. I could care less if someone doesn't get a tehter or even an execute when kled falls off skarl. However, his W and E have had KNOWN bugs since he came out! 

HE NEEDS THIS ATTENTION WHETHER IT BE BUFF OR NERF. Please upvote even if you disagree. If you DO disagree then just type out why please.
